All 18 Eagleville Restaurants» Greco-Roman Restaurant 2541 W. Main St. , Eagleville , PA 19403 610-631-1020 Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #7 of 18 restaurants in Eagleville 5 Reviews Cuisines: Greek, Italian Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 5 reviews from our community 60% Recommend Excellent 1 Very good 2 Average 2 Poor 0 Terrible 0 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 5 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any Gourmeseur Senior Contributor 30 reviews Reviews in 8 cities 7 helpful votes “Nice family place” Reviewed January 3, 2012 via mobile Try chicken grinders and Greek specialties A family affair of very nice people U will feel comfy here as a regular Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by Gourmeseur for Eagleville Papa_Deuce Collegeville, Pennsylvania Senior Contributor 42 reviews Reviews in 12 cities 17 helpful votes “Say Hello to Mario.” Reviewed December 11, 2011 As the name implies, this place makes Greek and Italian food. I don't particularly like Greek food, so I can't comment other than saying that I see lots of Greek people there... so I guess the food is good. I go for the Italian. And I love it. The service is good, and the place has had a recent makeover,... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 5 more reviews by Papa_Deuce for Eagleville kay036 Norristown, Pennsylvania Top Contributor 52 reviews Reviews in 22 cities 16 helpful votes “Great Gyro and tsaziki” Reviewed February 24, 2011 1 person found this review helpful We recently revisited this local place and we all loved the Greek food we had here. Don't know about the other kinds, but all the things we tried were wonderful. All of us agreed they make some of the best french fries around and the sauteed broccoli was incredible. This from a woman who won't eat broccoli most of the... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Moser100210 Skippack, Pennsylvania 2 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 3 helpful votes “Great food” Reviewed October 18, 2010 1 person found this review helpful I have been to this resturant many times. Always a good meal and everyone is always friendly. We recently had my rehersal dinner for my wedding here we had 40 plus people. Everyone kept saying how great the food was and how they could not wait to come back. Food and desserts are great and love the idea of BYOB.... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? ItalianCPA Nashville, TN 1 review 1 helpful vote “Decent Greek-Italian Restaurant near Philadelphia” Reviewed October 22, 2008 1 person found this review helpful I went with a group of 6 colleagues on a Tuesday night. When we arrived the place looked like a fast-food restaurant. It has an"Order here"sign above the counter. However, that is during the day. At night, it is a sit-down restaurant. The restaurant has zero atmosphere. It has metal, formica-topped tables and booths with pleather seating. It... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? 1-5 of 5 reviews 1 Also consider these other restaurants near Greco-Roman Restaurant Chap's Taproom 1 Review "Friday nights at Chaps......can't beat it!" 0.1 miles from Greco-Roman Restaurant Dairy Queen 2 Reviews 0.3 miles from Greco-Roman Restaurant Subway 1 Review 0.8 miles from Greco-Roman Restaurant All restaurants in Eagleville (18) Been to Greco-Roman Restaurant?
